short_bio: Chef Maria is a renowned expert in traditional Spanish cuisine.

recipes.name: Paella Valenciana
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken and rabbit with garlic, onion, and tomato. Add rice, green beans, and red peppers, and simmer until rice is cooked.

recipes.name: Gazpacho
recipes.instructions: Blend tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and bell pepper until smooth. Add bread crumbs, olive oil, and vinegar to taste.

recipes.name: Tortilla Española
recipes.instructions: Fry potatoes and onion in olive oil until tender. Beat eggs with salt and add to the pan. Flip the tortilla and cook until golden brown.

short_bio: Chef Hiroki is a master of Japanese fusion cuisine, blending traditional techniques with modern flavors.

recipes.name: Soba Noodle Salad
recipes.instructions: Boil soba noodles and drain. Toss with diced tofu, cucumber, and carrots. Drizzle with ginger dressing and serve.

recipes.name: Miso-glazed Salmon
recipes.instructions: Mix miso, mirin, sake, and sugar. Coat salmon and bake until glazed and cooked through.

recipes.name: Takoyaki
recipes.instructions: Mix flour, eggs, and dashi stock. Add diced octopus and green onion. Cook in a takoyaki pan until golden brown

short_bio: Chef Carla is a Mexican cuisine expert, blending traditional and modern techniques to create flavorful dishes.

recipes.name: Guacamole
recipes.instructions: Mash avocado with diced tomatoes, onion, and jalapeno. Add lime juice and salt to taste.

recipes.name: Chiles Rellenos
recipes.instructions: Roast poblano peppers and stuff with ground beef and rice. Top with queso fresco and tomato sauce and bake until bubbly.

recipes.name: Tamales
recipes.instructions: Mix cornmeal with pork, chiles, and tomatillos. Spread on soaked corn husks and steam until cooked through.

short_bio: Chef Giovanni is a master of Italian cuisine, specializing in regional dishes from all over Italy.

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
recipes.instructions: Roll out pizza dough and top with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil. Bake until crust is golden brown.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti until al dente. Fry pancetta and add to cooked spaghetti. Beat eggs with parmesan and black pepper. Toss spaghetti with egg mixture until coated.

recipes.name: Osso Buco
recipes.instructions: Brown veal shanks and remove from pan. Sauté carrots, celery, and onion in the same pan. Add white wine and return veal shanks to pan. Simmer until meat is tender

short_bio: Chef Sara is a dessert specialist, with a passion for creating sweet treats that look as good as they taste.

recipes.name: Chocolate Cake
recipes.instructions: Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs, flour, and melted chocolate. Bake until a toothpick comes out clean.

recipes.name: Strawberry Cheesecake
recipes.instructions: Mix graham cracker crumbs with melted butter. Press into the bottom of a springform pan. Mix cream cheese and sugar. Add mashed strawberries and whipped cream. Pour over crust and chill until set.

recipes.name: Lemon Bars
recipes.instructions: Mix flour, sugar, and butter. Press into a baking dish and bake until golden brown. Whisk together lemon juice, eggs, and sugar. Pour over crust and bake until set.

short_bio: Chef Toshiro is a Japanese cuisine expert, specializing in sushi, sashimi, and other traditional dishes.

recipes.name: California Roll
recipes.instructions: Roll sushi rice and avocado in seaweed. Top with crab meat, cucumber, and sesame seeds. Slice into bite-sized pieces.

recipes.name: Tempura Shrimp
recipes.instructions: Mix flour, cornstarch, and baking powder. Dip shrimp in beaten egg and then in flour mixture. Fry until golden brown.

recipes.name: Miso Soup
recipes.instructions: Bring dashi stock to a boil. Add miso paste and whisk until dissolved. Add diced tofu and seaweed. Simmer for a few minutes. Serve with chopped green onions on top.
